source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video is an extreme wide shot of a nighttime landscape, with no specific subjects. The scene is framed with a thin line of distant city lights positioned along the bottom of the frame in the background. Above this, a vast, dark storm cloud occupies the majority of the frame, stretching from the left edge across the center and top. A small area of clearer sky is visible in the bottom right, just above the horizon. Suddenly, a powerful lightning strike occurs within the cloud, primarily illuminating the upper left and central portions of the frame. The camera remains static and is positioned at a low height, looking across the flat terrain towards the immense sky.
